@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2011 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Tino Butz (tbtz) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The Slider widget provides horizontal slider. The Slider is the classic widget for controlling a bounded value. It lets the user move a slider handle along a horizontal groove and translates the handle's position into an integer value within the defined range. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

    var slider= new qx.ui.mobile.form.Slider().set({
       minimum : 0,
       maximum : 10,
       step : 2
     });
     slider.addListener("changeValue", handler, this);
   this.getRoot.add(slider);

This example creates a slider and attaches an event listener to the {@link #changeValue} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The minimum slider value (may be negative). This value must be smaller than {@link #maximum}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum slider value (may be negative). This value must be larger than {@link #minimum}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The amount to increment on each event. Typically corresponds to the user moving the knob.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Reverses the display direction of the slider knob. If true, the maxmium of the slider is on the left side and minimum on the right side.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adjusts which slider value should be displayed inside the knob. If null no value will be displayed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Increments the current value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Decrements the current value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.body: Creates the knob element.

@description.body: Registers all needed event listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Unregisters all needed event listener.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Refreshes the slider and the knob position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates all internal sizes of the slider.

@description.body: Sets the value of this slider. It is called by setValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@param.body: value {Integer} the new value of the slider
@param.description: the new value of the slider

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the value [true/false] of this slider. It is called by getValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the knob position based on the current value.

@description.body: Converts the given percent to the position of the knob.

@description.body: Limits a value to the set {@link #minimum} and {@link #maximum} properties.

@param.name: @param

@param.name: @param
@param.body: width {Integer} The width of the slider container element
@param.description: The width of the slider container element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the overall number of steps.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the range between {@link #maximum} and {@link #minimum}.
